description: This trail travels to the top of a ridge overlooking Rock Lake.  From the cliffs at the top there is an excellent view over the lake.  The trail descends to the lake and follws an abandoned railway back to the starting point.
directions: TakeHiway 60 21.5km West from the abandoned rail bed in downtown Whitney, ON to the Rock Lake Road.  Then take the Rock Lake Road 8.3km south.  Follow the road past the Rock lake campground to the parking lot at the very end of the road.
title: Booth Rock Trail Algonquin Park
